description: This classic Italian dish must have hundreds of versions, all resulting in a rustic braise of chicken, aromatic vegetables and tomatoes My version includes lots of mushrooms, both dried and fresh You can add kale to the dish if you want to work in some leafy greens (see variation below).
title: Chicken Cacciatore With Mushrooms, Tomatoes and Wine
title_page: Chicken Cacciatore With Mushrooms, Tomatoes and Wine Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This classic Italian dish must have hundreds of versions, all resulting in a rustic braise of chicken, aromatic vegetables and tomatoes. My version includes lots of mushrooms, both dried and fresh. You can add kale to the dish if you want to work in some leafy greens (see variation below).
Featured in: Chicken Stews, To Savor Or Store Away.
